alert.note: Alert for Carteret; Craven (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued January 16 at 5:56PM EST by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of eastern North Carolina, including the following areas, Carteret and Craven. * WHEN...Until 800 PM EST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 555 PM EST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Around 2 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts up to 1 inch are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... New Bern, Havelock, Morehead City, Newport, Harkers Island, Cape Carteret, Atlantic Beach, Pine Knoll Shores, and Emerald Isle. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
